channel.title: Changing client background
channel.description:
Hey guys, I am having some trouble changing my clients background... I did all the things it said in a tut, ill tell what i did briefly.
> I Made my own background, corresponding to the size of the original background. > I saved the new background to m client files in the same place the old one was. > Then i deleted the old picture and renamed my new one the same as the old one...
If any one knows what i am doing wrong would they please share it with me ^.^
Thanks ~ Ziege Terra ~ [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2009, 02:13:54 am[/size][hr]Lol, don't worry, i got it XD

item.title: Changing client background
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

No man, It’s fine now, thanks.

The problem was it wasn’t loading because i had to flip one half of the picture… But it is fixed now… so thanks guys ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Changing client background
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

Your not doing anything wrong, it should be working, But i think i know why it’s not working, it’s probably a different file type.
It might of been a .GIF but you saved it at OLDNAME.jpg or png etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing client background
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Hey guys, I am having some trouble changing my clients background… I did all the things it said in a tut, ill tell what i did briefly.

I Made my own background, corresponding to the size of the original background.
I saved the new background to m client files in the same place the old one was.
Then i deleted the old picture and renamed my new one the same as the old one…

If any one knows what i am doing wrong would they please share it with me ^.^

Thanks
~ Ziege Terra ~ [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2009, 02:13:54 am[/size][hr]Lol, don’t worry, i got it XD

Read full topic
